headline: Student Crushes Latest Advanced Topics Assignment
author: Cpt. Theiss
body: After a most recent food coma, the Adv. Topics class got off their post-vacation butts and re-engaged into Web Dev. This Breaking News comes just after a Purple level lockdown as been implemented in the Los Angeles area. The only thing that could actually make this year more exciting is if we are able to (as a class) actually get a fake news site up and running before break. Only time will tell but Mr. Theiss is hopefull

headline: New Homework Policy Goes Unnoticed
author: Rookie Theiss
body: A purple level homework policy is now in effect. This is not a drill.

headline: Code fails to compile

body: A purple level homework policy is now in effect. This is not a drill.
